mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_GUEST_BOOK(HOST_MEMBER_ID, GUEST_MEMBER_ID, CONTENTS, REG_ID, REG_DT, UPD_ID, UPD_DT) VALUES (#{hostMemberId}, #{guestMemberId}, #{contents}, #{guestMemberId}, #{regDt}, #{guestMemberId}, #{updDt})
mapper.select: SELECT TB_GUEST_BOOK.GUEST_BOOK_ID, TB_GUEST_BOOK.HOST_MEMBER_ID, TB_GUEST_BOOK.GUEST_MEMBER_ID, TB_GUEST_BOOK.CONTENTS, TB_GUEST_BOOK.REG_DT, TB_MEMBER.NICKNAME FROM TB_GUEST_BOOK JOIN TB_MEMBER ON TB_GUEST_BOOK.GUEST_MEMBER_ID = TB_MEMBER.MEMBER_ID WHERE TB_GUEST_BOOK.HOST_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY TB_GUEST_BOOK.GUEST_BOOK_ID DESC
